def query(l, r):
    res = 0
    l += num
    r += num
    while l < r:
        if l % 2 == 1:
            res = max(res, tree[l])
            l += 1
        if r % 2 == 1:
            r -= 1
            res = max(res, tree[r])
        l >>=1
        r >>=1
    return res
